Style/SymbolProc.description:
Description

Use symbols as procs instead of blocks when possible.
Style/SymbolProc.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowMethodsWithArguments: False (type: bool)
AllowedMethods: ['define_method'] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
AllowComments: False (type: bool)
